p: Over the past 10 years, research on the anti-ulcerogenic mechanism of action of flavonoids has involved the multifaceted study of the disease, including damage to the gastric mucosa directly associated with extracellular matrix (MEC) degradation, in which matrix metalloproteinases (MMPs) play a crucial role. In the past 10 years, several animal studies with gastric ulcers have focused on the role of MMP-2 and MMP-9.
